languages.text: {n}Октавиана наклоняется вперед.{/n} "За этой стойкой люди часто развязывают языки, а мне за молчание никто не платит. Высокие гости вроде вас одним своим визитом повышают статус моему заведению, так что могу отплатить вам, поделившись тем, что услышала краем уха. Быть может, пригодится... в ваших делах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Октавиана наклоняется вперед.{/n} "За этой стойкой люди часто развязывают языки, а мне за молчание никто не платит. Высокие гости вроде вас одним своим визитом повышают статус моему заведению, так что могу отплатить вам, поделившись тем, что услышала краем уха. Быть может, пригодится... в ваших делах".

languages.text: {n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "Sitting at this bar often puts folks in a talkative mood... and I don't see anybody paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана наклоняется вперед.{/n} "За этой стойкой люди часто развязывают языки, а мне за молчание никто не платит. Высокие гости вроде вас одним своим визитом повышают статус моему заведению, так что могу отплатить вам, поделившись тем, что услышала краем уха. Быть может, пригодится... в ваших делах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "People often let their tongues loose at this bar, and not one of them is paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent guests like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Might be something useful... for your business."

{n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "People often let their tongues loose at this bar, and not one of them is paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent guests like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Might be something useful... for your business."

Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜朝你靠了过来。{/n}“来到这间酒吧的人们通常都很健谈……而且并没有人付过钱让我闭嘴。像你这样的高端人士造访，会让这间酒吧变得更有名气。因此，作为回报，我可以向你分享我无意中听到的消息。有些消息或许会……对你的生意有帮助。”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "Sitting at this bar often puts folks in a talkative mood... and I don't see anybody paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜朝你靠了过来。{/n}“来到这间酒吧的人们通常都很健谈……而且并没有人付过钱让我闭嘴。像你这样的高端人士造访，会让这间酒吧变得更有名气。因此，作为回报，我可以向你分享我无意中听到的消息。有些消息或许会……对你的生意有帮助。”

languages.text: {n}Octaviana se inclina hacia adelante.{/n} «La gente que viene aquí a sentarse suele acabar charlando de más... y nadie me paga para que me muerda la lengua. Que nos visiten eminencias como tú le da más estatus al establecimiento, qué menos que compensarte contándote lo que escucho. Puede que te sea de utilidad... en tus negocios».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "Sitting at this bar often puts folks in a talkative mood... and I don't see anybody paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana se inclina hacia adelante.{/n} «La gente que viene aquí a sentarse suele acabar charlando de más... y nadie me paga para que me muerda la lengua. Que nos visiten eminencias como tú le da más estatus al establecimiento, qué menos que compensarte contándote lo que escucho. Puede que te sea de utilidad... en tus negocios».

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナが前にかがんできた。{/n}「このバーに座っていると皆お喋りになる…あたしだって口止め料をもらってるわけじゃない。あんたみたいな著名人がここに来てくれたら、この店の各格が上がるってもんだ。だから、お礼の代わりに小耳に挟んだことをあんたに話してあげるよ。あんたの『仕事』の役に立つかもしれないしね…」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "Sitting at this bar often puts folks in a talkative mood... and I don't see anybody paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナが前にかがんできた。{/n}「このバーに座っていると皆お喋りになる…あたしだって口止め料をもらってるわけじゃない。あんたみたいな著名人がここに来てくれたら、この店の各格が上がるってもんだ。だから、お礼の代わりに小耳に挟んだことをあんたに話してあげるよ。あんたの『仕事』の役に立つかもしれないしね…」

languages.text: {n}Octaviana lehnt sich nach vorne.{/n} "Wenn Leute an dieser Bar sitzen, werden sie oftmals gesprächig ... und niemand bezahlt mich dafür, dass ich den Mund halte. Besuche von bedeutenden Personen wie Euch verbessern den Status meines Etablissements, und das kann ich wiedergutmachen, indem ich mit Euch teile, was ich gehört habe. Einiges davon hilft Euch vielleicht ... bei Euren Geschäften."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "Sitting at this bar often puts folks in a talkative mood... and I don't see anybody paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana lehnt sich nach vorne.{/n} "Wenn Leute an dieser Bar sitzen, werden sie oftmals gesprächig ... und niemand bezahlt mich dafür, dass ich den Mund halte. Besuche von bedeutenden Personen wie Euch verbessern den Status meines Etablissements, und das kann ich wiedergutmachen, indem ich mit Euch teile, was ich gehört habe. Einiges davon hilft Euch vielleicht ... bei Euren Geschäften."

languages.text: {n}Octaviana se penche en avant.{/n} « Les gens assis au bar sont souvent d'humeur bavarde... et personne ne me paie pour me taire. La visite de gens importants comme vous, c'est un petit coup de pouce pour notre réputation, alors je peux bien vous renvoyer l'ascenseur en vous racontant ce que j'ai entendu. Mes petites infos pourraient peut-être... faciliter vos propres affaires. »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "Sitting at this bar often puts folks in a talkative mood... and I don't see anybody paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana se penche en avant.{/n} « Les gens assis au bar sont souvent d'humeur bavarde... et personne ne me paie pour me taire. La visite de gens importants comme vous, c'est un petit coup de pouce pour notre réputation, alors je peux bien vous renvoyer l'ascenseur en vous racontant ce que j'ai entendu. Mes petites infos pourraient peut-être... faciliter vos propres affaires. »

languages.text: {n}Octaviana öne eğiliyor.{/n} "Bu barda oturanların genelde çenesi açılır... Kimse de bana susmam için para ödemiyor tabii. Sizin gibi seçkin müşteriler müessesemin prestijini artırdığından, size olan borcumu kulak misafiri olduklarımı paylaşarak ödeyebilirim. Belki anlatacaklarımın... İş ilişkilerinize faydası dokunur."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana leans forward.{/n} "Sitting at this bar often puts folks in a talkative mood... and I don't see anybody paying me to keep quiet. Visits from eminent individuals like yourself boost the status of my establishment, so I can repay you by sharing what I've overheard. Some of it might help you out... in your dealings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana öne eğiliyor.{/n} "Bu barda oturunca genelde milletin çenesi düşüyor... Kimse de bana susmam için para ödemiyor tabii. Sizin gibi seçkin müşteriler gelince işletmemin prestiji arttığına göre, ben de kulak misafiri olduklarımı sizinle paylaşayım bari de minnet borcum kalmasın. Belki duyduklarım işinize gelir."
